



直接挖矿 到系统生成的地址
rt generate 100 

StephenSun@debian-1:~/bitcoin/study/gdb/mining$ rt getaddressesbyaccount ""
[
  "2MsvmB4K5yFMxAdFhGyGW87SeWrPRSksRYJ",
  "2Mva38hwbWhkSC3xR6aGDKgyqFpugWss7oQ",
  "2N2EYbEMbZyr1zy7GAghRKSDo4EXpFYRvQM"
]
挖矿到特定的地址

StephenSun@debian-1:~/bitcoin/study/gdb/mining$ rt generatetoaddress  1 2N2EYbEMbZyr1zy7GAghRKSDo4EXpFYRvQM
[
  "723ea73beae02d8e1f5c5591304b2581d846265ecdec2a4e4f1fd2e1aa1512b4"
]

StephenSun@debian-1:~/bitcoin/study/gdb$ rt sendrawtransaction 
2a16bc4d3ce5bcbda8a77ec420e453b8a3c3ae49cc44e384e89d95e1d222c8f3
